# Request for Standing Offer: Fire, Safety and Rescue Equipment {#request-SEO}

## Overview {#overview-id}

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RfSO) for the provision of Fire, Safety and Rescue Equipment. This national master standing offer (NMSO) is intended to supply deliverables throughout Canada, excluding the Canadian territories.

## Key Details {#key-id}

*   **Request ID**: WS4294207175
*   **Publication Date**: November 7, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: December 20, 2023, at 2 PM Eastern Time
*   **NMSO Duration**: 1 year with three optional periods (1 year each)
*   **Trade Agreements**: This procurement is open to suppliers who are member countries of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## Category and UNSPSC Codes {#unspsc-id}

The NMSO covers the following categories and UNSPSC codes:

*   Fall protection and rescue equipment (46182300)
*   Fire-fighting equipment (46191600)

## Procurement Method {#proc-method}

This RfSO will be managed through a competitive, open bidding process. Bidders will be selected based on the lowest price submitted.

## Instructions for Suppliers {#supplier-instruction}

To express interest in this RfSO, visit the tender listing page on the Ariba Discovery platform: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17940967](https://discovery/ariba.com/rfx/17940967)
